attributes.action: Modify the electoral system to better reflect the will of the people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use the Condorcet voting system to determine the 2 favourite candidates in each electorate and allow both to sit in parliament with a fraction of a vote equal to the proportion of the people in their electorate whose votes were assigned to them once the two preferred candidates were established. This would give a mathematically sound preferential voting system that reflects the will of the people quite accurately, while filtering out extremist parties.
